hibernate-mapping.query: from PeerAssessmentItem p where p.submissionId in (:submissionIds) order by p.assignmentId, p.submissionId, p.assessorUserId
from PeerAssessmentItem p where p.assessorUserId = :assessorUserId and p.assignmentId = :assignmentId order by p.assignmentId, p.submissionId, p.assessorUserId
from PeerAssessmentItem p where p.assessorUserId = :assessorUserId and p.submissionId = :submissionId order by p.assignmentId, p.submissionId, p.assessorUserId
from PeerAssessmentItem p where p.submissionId = :submissionId order by p.assignmentId, p.submissionId, p.assessorUserId
from PeerAssessmentItem p where p.assignmentId = :assignmentId order by p.assignmentId, p.submissionId, p.assessorUserId

database-object.create: create index PEER_ASSESSOR_I on ASN_PEER_ASSESSMENT_ITEM_T (SUBMISSION_ID, ASSESSOR_USER_ID);
create index PEER_ASSESSOR2_I on ASN_PEER_ASSESSMENT_ITEM_T (ASSIGNMENT_ID, ASSESSOR_USER_ID);
